thread.title: Perfect stay in New York -
thread.title_full: Perfect stay in New York - Review of Room Mate Grace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Vladislav V
title: Perfect stay in New York -
text: I am very satisfied with your stay at your hotel. I want to note an excellent location, in the heart of the city. Fast settlement, courteous staff, ready to answer any questions. A small but homely and quiet room. Very clean, everything you need for a traveler. Cleaning every day, all cosmetic accessories replenished every day, as well as tea bags and coffee. On my next visit to New York, I will definitely choose this hotel for living, as I will advise his friends. Thank you for the warm welcome, all the best to you.
